mn148:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn148:2.1_2: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
mn148:2.3_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn148:2.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
mn148:4.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:4.3_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ, sotāyatanaṁ, ghānāyatanaṁ, jivhāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, manāyatanaṁ.
mn148:4.5_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:5.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:5.3_0: Rūpāyatanaṁ, saddāyatanaṁ, gandhāyatanaṁ, rasāyatanaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, dhammāyatanaṁ.
mn148:5.5_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:6.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:6.3_0: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.4_0: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.5_0: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.6_0: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.7_0: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.8_0: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ.
mn148:6.10_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:7.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:7.3_0: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.4_0: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.5_0: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.6_0: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.7_0: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.8_0: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso.
mn148:7.10_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:8.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:8.3_0: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.4_0: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.5_0: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.6_0: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.7_0: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.8_0: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā.
mn148:8.10_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.

mn148:9.4_0: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn148:9.5_0: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ …
mn148:9.6_0: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ …
mn148:9.7_0: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ …
mn148:9.8_0: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:9.10_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:10.1_0: ‘Cakkhu attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.3_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.7_0: ‘Rūpā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.9_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.13_0: ‘Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.15_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.18_0: Iti cakkhu anattā, rūpā anattā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ anattā.
mn148:10.19_0: ‘Cakkhusamphasso attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.21_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.24_0: Iti cakkhu anattā, rūpā anattā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ anattā, cakkhusamphasso anattā.
mn148:10.25_0: ‘Vedanā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.27_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.30_0: Iti cakkhu anattā, rūpā anattā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ anattā, cakkhusamphasso anattā, vedanā anattā.
mn148:10.31_0: ‘Taṇhā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.33_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:11.5_0: ‘mano attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:11.7_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:12.1_0: ‘Dhammā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:12.3_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:13.1_0: ‘Manoviññāṇaṁ attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:13.3_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:13.6_0: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā.
mn148:14.1_0: ‘Manosamphasso attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:14.3_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:14.6_0: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā, manosamphasso anattā.
mn148:15.1_0: ‘Vedanā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:15.3_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:15.6_0: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā, manosamphasso anattā, vedanā anattā.
mn148:15.7_0: ‘Taṇhā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:15.9_0: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:16.1_0: Ayaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā—
mn148:16.2_0: cakkhuṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.1_0: rūpe ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;

mn148:17-21.6_0: sotaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.7_0: ghānaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.8_0: jivhaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.9_0: kāyaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:22.1_0: Ayaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā—
mn148:22.2_0: cakkhuṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.

mn148:23-27.11_0: Dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.12_0: Manoviññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.

mn148:28.1_4: phassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā.
mn148:28.2_0: So sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn148:28.4_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:28.6_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno tassā vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
mn148:28.8_2: sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayaṁ appahāya dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayaṁ appaṭivinodetvā adukkhamasukhāya
mn148:28.8_3: vedanāya avijjānusayaṁ asamūhanitvā avijjaṁ appahāya vijjaṁ anuppādetvā diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro

mn148:29-33.12_3: vedanāya avijjānusayaṁ asamūhanitvā avijjaṁ appahāya vijjaṁ anuppādetvā diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro

mn148:34.8_2: sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayaṁ pahāya dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayaṁ paṭivinodetvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya

mn148:41.6_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
mn148:41.7_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
mn148:41.9_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
mn148:41.10_0: Imasmiṁ kho pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsūti.
